class_notes:
Prerequisite: Business Associations (concurrently NOT okay), Contract Drafting (concurrently NOT okay), Deal Skills (concurrently okay). Recommended Prerequisites/Corequisites: Corporate Finance, Accounting in Action or Analytical Methods.
Preselected Transactional Certificate Students will receive an email informing them how/when to
enroll. Non-transactional certificate students who meet the pre-reqs may try to enroll during Open Enrollment.
prerequisites: Business Associations, Contract Drafting, and Deal Skills are pre-requisites for this course. If you have not satisfied all courses, then you are not eligible to enroll at this time. Please contact Kelli.Pittman@emory.edu with all inquiries.
